===Etymology 1===
[[Image:Chimp Brain in a jar.jpg|thumb|220px|{{lang|ja|脳}} (''nazuki'', ''nō''): a '''[[brain]]''' in a jar.]]
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=kun|なずき}}
{{IPAchar|/naduki/}} → {{IPAchar|/nad͡zuki/}} → {{IPAchar|/nazuki/}}

Originally the noun stem form ''naduki'' of verb {{m|ja|漬く}} (''naduku'', modern ''nazuku'', “to be immersed in water or other liquid”).
